alert.note: Alert for Madison; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:03PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...In New York; Madison and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may approach 1 inch per hour Saturday evening. Highest accumulations will be at higher elevations in southern Madison county with lower totals in the Mohawk valley.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
